description: Bourbon Sour is a classic cocktail that is making a comeback in&nbsp;bars and restaurants across the country. Sour refers to the citrus juice used to balance out the sweetness of the bourbon.Some&nbsp;bartenders like to add an egg white to give the drink a foamy texture, but this is optional. The key to making a perfect Bourbon Sour is to use fresh, quality ingredients.
name: Bourbon Sour
recipeIngredient: Orange peel and a cocktail cherry for garnish
